post.body: Shows how much I follow the NBA anymore! I went and checked to make sure MJ is still in the front office!
Good to hear about LB. Where is he now?
Yes, problem is I was Twitter/Plurk side tracked today....looking at too many sites like Tatango. Would of course love your thoughts
Come on now! If Coach K walks in I'm done with you!?!?!
Thanks, just heard about it today and showed it to a guy here who I know would like to know more.
No problem, just jealous of you 2, plus @teachakidd with that Florida weather!
I just played with Tatango earlier for group text/voice messages. Another office day tomorrow if I don't get to Wiggio tonight.
The worst kind.
Good luck with that.
Great to hear that you got some ink there. I have a tab open to check out Wiggio...haven't gotten there yet.
You have me trying to formulate a blog post as well....I for one appreciate all of your thoughts and work at your school.
@chocxtc I'm in a cubicle trying to get work done and don't even have change for a pop!
You know, I thought of that.....maybe next time.
Just tweeted about that, getting mine replaced Monday it looks like. Did they quote you a price?
I hope Amelia feels better soon. Must be the weather!
Thanks for the http:://www.mathway.com/ link.
I agree. I think tomorrow I will just be managing rss feeder catchup and Twitter/Plurk.
e tu @drewpolly ?
RT Thanks @theresagray An area superintendent looking for thoughts about keeping up with tech: http://tinyurl.com/7a9yt8
$250 to fix replace a wheel bearing? Thought that was a tad high.
